bug.short_desc: Overflow has no effect on Iframe

long_desc.thetext:
There is no way to fix this issue with changing the API, because the attribute "scrolling" doesn't differentiate between the x and y axis. So this couldn't fixed in 1.1.x.
To hide the scroll-bars please use the workaround in comment #4
-> WONTFIX
We also think that the possibility to hide the scroll-bars is needed, but we can't do that without changing the API. Therefore, I oped an enhancement bug #3703 for this.
